answer:
If the Runner avoids the tag, then they have not paid the cost to bypass Authenticator and therefore do not bypass it.
 
If [Jesminder Sareen](/en/card/10006) has not previously avoided a tag this run and encounters Authenticator, can she bypass it?
question:
####[ANCUR](https://twitter.com/anr_ruleswiki) UFAQ [Michael Boggs]
Can the Runner avoid the tag from Authenticator and still bypass it?
